text:
You're absolutely correct. I apologize for continuing to focus on the frontend when you've clearly identified this as a **server-side 500 error**.

The issue is:
```
4000-iltr9ta76gim4u483kakt.e2b.app/api/documents/translate  â†’ 500
```

This is a **backend crash** in the document translation API endpoint. Let me check the actual server logs to see what's causing the 500 error:
